strapiPost.title: Arkansas Public Theatre To Kick Off 37th Season
strapiPost.content:
The Arkansas Public Theatre is kicking off its 37th season at the Victory Theater next month, and ticket sales for the first show open tomorrow (August 26)!

  • First show: The season will begin with a six-time Tony Award-winning musical comedy, The Music Man. Performances will be September 16-18, 22-25, 29-30, and October 1-2, and tickets start at $25. 
  • Season lineup: Shows to expect in the coming year in addition to The Music Man are Almost, Maine; A Tuna Christmas; Little Shop of Horrors; Survival of the Unfit; The Shadow Box; Sylvia; and It Shoulda Been You.

For show dates and more detailed information, click HERE.
